name: Hit a different barrier with each ball in 7 consecutive frames (Bowling Spin Control)
Land on fairway, rough, deep rough, fringe and green on one hole (Golf)
Finish any B 3-hole course, no GiveUp (Golf)
Hit 6 red (+4) moles (Tennis Moles / Mole Commotion)
200 points with only 2 punches (Fowl Dodgeball / Duck and Dodge)
520 points with barrier deflection before pin contact (100-Pin Pro / Triple Whammy)
Cover 2 spaces with a single ball (Chip-In Bingo / Bingo Clubber)
Hit the pink (+100) wall 4 times (Wall Breaker / Smash Hitter)
Miss boxes with 7 consecutive pitches (Pitch Perfect / Pitch for Prizes)
500 points across multiple games (Tennis Moles / Mole Commotion)
Collect 12 stars while clearing stages (Spare Pickups / Shoot for the Spares)
